name: Dark Instagram++
description: Hey üëãüèΩ Dark Instagram++ is literally as the title says, a dark mode for the website Instagram lol. More features coming soon for sure. Feel free to suggest a change or give feedback. Both are really appreciated. Made with üíñby Justin Ikeako
additional_info: VERSION 1.3.11 ‚Ä¢ Fixed theming of profile-related text VERSION 1.3.10 ‚Ä¢ Fixed theming of the comment section & image loading indicator VERSION 1.3.9 ‚Ä¢ Fixed theming of posts again VERSION 1.3.8 ‚Ä¢ Fixed theming of posts ‚Ä¢ Quality of life (QoL) changes to borders around the user interface VERSION 1.3.7 ‚Ä¢ Fixed theming of dialog boxes VERSION 1.3.6 ‚Ä¢ Fixed some icons for stories ‚Ä¢ Borders on the home page are now consistent ‚Ä¢ Fixed the weird partially white suggested accounts box ‚Ä¢ Related hashtags are more visible now VERSION 1.3.5 ‚Ä¢ Added support for the DM page (probably not fully done) VERSION 1.3.4 ‚Ä¢ Usernames in the stories are visible again. VERSION 1.3.3 ‚Ä¢ Posts are themed properly again. VERSION 1.3.2 ‚Ä¢ Suggested section is themed properly again. ‚Ä¢ Also, the home icon is no longer brighter than the others. VERSION 1.3.1 ‚Ä¢ Logo now fits the theme properly. VERSION 1.3.0 ‚Ä¢ Major upgrades to the scrollbar. VERSION 1.2.3 ‚Ä¢ Like, comment, share and bookmark buttons are visible again. VERSION 1.2.2 ‚Ä¢ Login/Sign up credentials are visible again. VERSION 1.2.1 ‚Ä¢ Usernames are visible again. VERSION 1.2.0 ‚Ä¢ Fixed bright loading screen. ‚Ä¢ Icons fixed as well (they're switching to svg üéâ). VERSION 1.1.1 ‚Ä¢ Minor text color alterations. VERSION 1.1.0 ‚Ä¢ Comments are now toggleable. VERSION 1.0.0 ‚Ä¢ Deployed üéâ
